# Drone News 48h Brief — February 05, 2026

_Window: last 48 hours; 100 incidents._

## Summary
In the past 48 hours, multiple drone incidents have occurred, predominantly focusing on unauthorized operations and military engagements. In the U.S., a navy reservist was reported operating an unauthorized drone at Whidbey Island, leading to two separate incidents of unauthorized drone operation. Meanwhile, U.S. military actions escalated as they shot down an Iranian drone approaching the USS Abraham Lincoln in the Arabian Sea, amidst ongoing tensions related to Iranian drone operations near military assets. In addition, concerns around drone smuggling have been highlighted, particularly in the context of prison contraband, with incidents involving drones delivering drugs. Globally, reports indicate a significant uptick in drone attacks in Ukraine, as Russia intensified its military drone strikes ahead of peace negotiations, further complicating the geopolitical landscape.

**By category:** airport: 1 • arrest: 7 • crash: 2 • other: 66 • security: 8 • smuggling: 14 • terrorism: 2
**Top queries:** drone incident (47), drone prison (12), drone terrorism (12), drone arrest (9), unauthorized drone (9)
